code: import React from"react";import"./ProjectsStyles.css";import{getImg}from"../../utils";import project from"../data/Projects.json";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProjectCard=_ref=>{let{project:{title,imageSrc,description,skills,GitHub,appSource}}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"containe",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:getImg(title),alt:project.title,className:"image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"ptitle",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"description",children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"skills",children:skills.map((skill,id)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:"skill",children:skill},id);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"links",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:GitHub,className:"link",children:"GitHub"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:appSource,className:"link",children:"Site"})]})]});};export default ProjectCard;
